DOC.brief_title: Effect Evaluation Work Rehabilitation Effort `` Best iLag ''
DOC.detailed_description: The study RCT compare effect group-based intervention individual work-out intervention work participation . The target group person risk leave work force due health issue , people currently outside work force . The intervention time-span 3 month . Survey data collect baseline , three month ( intervention end ) , 15 month . Survey data include information lifestyle , self-reported health , subjective health complaint readiness work . Register data employment welfare benefit collect two year advance inclusion , five year inclusion . According power calculation , study need 322 participant . In addition effect evaluation , process evaluation also perform . The process evaluation examine content quality adherence guideline , well feasibility group intervention . The process evaluation consist survey data well interview service provider participant .
DOC.criteria: Desire work Understand Norwegian sufficiently complete survey Not able participate intervention due personal healthrelated constraint .
